items.name: Mozzarella Sticks
items.description: Crispy breaded mozzarella sticks served with marinara sauce.

items.name: Chicken Wings
items.description: Choice of buffalo, BBQ, or garlic parmesan sauce. Served with celery sticks and ranch dressing.

items.name: Classic Burger
items.description: Juicy beef patty topped with lettuce, tomato, onion, and pickles. Served with fries.

items.name: Grilled Salmon
items.description: Fresh salmon fillet grilled to perfection and served with seasonal vegetables and rice.

items.name: New York Cheesecake
items.description: Creamy cheesecake on a graham cracker crust. Topped with strawberry compote.

items.name: Chocolate Lava Cake
items.description: Warm chocolate cake with a molten chocolate center. Served with vanilla ice cream.
